column4: so, anybody know how to fix fglrx problems (like it not loading)
how'd you install?
installed in 5.10 and upgraded to 6.06 (also tried full removal and reinstall)
which fglrx driver though?  the official one or the repos one?
repos
k, what do you mean by not loading
glxinfo and fglrxinfo report sgi/mesa and no acceleration
have you done a reboot yet to load the module?
yeah
the module is loaded (as per lsmod and modprobe just in case)
have you added it to /etc/modules and changed xorg.conf ?
oh ok
xorg.conf has fglrx in place of ati and such
read /var/log/Xorg.0.log
it should say you're using fglrx for one.  two...look for errors
it warns that desktop setting is invalid (it is set to null)
i don't know what that means :/-
have you tried doing the official driver?
yeah, that's about where I'm stuck too.  problem is, there isn't any obvious problem until you go to use GL
no, i guess that's next
thanks for trying
sorry i couldn't help more
